V.ii.1.A.3.e
.
Basis for Rejecting Medical Evidence
The rating activity may
not
rely upon its own unsubstantiated medical conclusions to reject expert medical evidence provided by the claimant.
Reference
:Â  For more information on the basis for rejecting medical evidence, see
Shipwash v. Brown
, 8 Vet.App. 218 (1995), and
Colvin v. Derwinski
, Vet.App. 175 (1991).
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Principles of Reviewing and Weighing Evidence
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
